contentList.content: Fleabite
A creature that you can see, within 10ft, takes [1].
Frostwind Blade
Magical ice encrusts your weapon, causing its attack to deal Cold damage.
Chill
The Target begins to feel unnaturally cold. Unless they are resistant to cold damage, they will become chilled and distracted, giving them disadvantage on Perception checks.
Ignite
An object or surface of your choice catches fire. If a creature is making direct contact with the object or surface, it takes 1d4 Fire damage.
Melt
Your hands become unnaturally warm. You may touch someone to deal [1]. The target also loses the Chilled status, if they already had it.
Gust
A strong breeze momentarilly distracts any creature caught in its radius.
Frostbite

You cause numbing frost to form on one creature that you touch. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 1d6 cold damage, and it has disadvantage on the next weapon attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
Pinprick

You reach your hands out at a creature you can see within range. A sharp pain strikes their body, dealing [1]. An affected creature takes an additional 3 piercing damage at the start of its next turn.
Flash
All enemies caught within the area of the spell must succeed a Constitution save, or become Blinded for 2 rounds.
Sparks
Sparks of electricity shoot from your fingertips in a 15-foot cone, dealing [1].
On a successful save, targets only take half as much damage.
Thundering Armor
You infuse a creature's armor or clothing with pulsing energy, increasing its protection by +2 AC.
The target also gains the ability sacrifice the spell's effects to blast nearby enemies away.
Release Energy
You release the energy pulsing through your armor from the Thundering Armor into a single creature, dealing [1] and pushing them away.
Release Energy (Area)
You release the energy pulsing through your armor from the Thundering Armor, dealing force damage and pushing away nearby creatures.
Torpor
Raw Magicka drips from your hands, slowing down the target, and reducing their AC by 2.
Wound
Deep Gashes appear on the target, reducing its maximum hit points and dealing damage equal to your Wisdom Modifier.
